alert.note: Alert for La Moure (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 11:56PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN LAMOURE COUNTY THROUGH 1215 AM CDT... At 1156 PM CDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 5 miles southeast of Litchville, or 22 miles south of Valley City, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern LaMoure County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for southeastern North Dakota.
